page.title: 20PIG OAK
page.content: In the village of Holt there is{Pig {Oak.}It is named after an oak tree in the middle of a field. The owners of the field had to take their pigs to the tree so that they could eat the acorns. They did this because ponies were in the field and too many acorns kill them. {THE FARM AND TACKROOM Pig Oak Farm is mainly a beef and cattle farm. One of the rooms in the farm itself is the tackroom. It contains everything for horses and their riders including cleaning kits and medical equipment for the horses, and clothes for the riders. It is cheaper to buy medical supplies from the tackroom than from your local vet.
